title: Can we give donations to an orphanage or school that teaches corrupt aqeedah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: can i contribute to an orphanage and a school for poor people but they teach corrupt akida the answer is no you must not give your money to a place that endorses and promotes corrupt for children who will become men with corrupt simply give your money to places that you know that would endorse and promote the authentic appeal of the prophet isaiah
